item.title: Pokémon Pokopia Release Date Announced
item.content:encoded:
Nintendo has officially announced the release date of Pokémon Pokopia, with a new trailer for the game set to be released later this week.

Revealed during September’s Nintendo Direct, Pokémon Pokopia is a new spin-off title for the franchise that is releasing exclusively for Nintendo Switch 2, and more key details have been revealed, including the official release date.

Pokémon Pokopia Releases March 5

In a post on X (formerly Twitter), Nintendo announced that Pokémon Pokopia will be released on March 5, just a week after Pokémon celebrates its 30th anniversary.

It has also been confirmed that Pokémon Pokopia will not have a physical release and, instead, non-downloaded copies will come with a game key card to unlock the download.

Further details for Pokémon Pokopia have also been revealed on the game’s official Japanese website, which confirms the Animal Crossing-like details of the game.

In Pokémon Pokopia, players will collect stones and wood to make furniture, grow vegetables in cultivated fields, and build homes for their Pokémon, while it was also confirmed that time in-game is linked to the real world.

The weather and time of day will impact the personalities of various Pokémon, while it’s also teased that “maybe one day you’ll be able to build a big city and invite Pokémon and other players over.”

More details for the game will be revealed in a new trailer, due to be released on Thursday, November 13 at 2 PM UTC.

Are you excited for the release of Pokémon Pokopia next year? Let us know what you’re expecting from the game in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Pokémon, check out the release date for the Legends: Z-A Mega Dimension DLC, and find out how to get Mega Diancie in Legends: Z-A.

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1607: Hints And Answer For November 12, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Wordle challenges players to guess a fresh five-letter word each day in six tries or fewer. Whether you’re a beginner or a daily player, today’s tips and strategies can help you solve it faster and maintain your streak—if you’re open to a little extra help. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1607 for November 12, 2025.

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here. If you’ve missed any days, check out our Wordle Answer Archive for every past answer.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There is currently no app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, November 12, 2025

The Wordle answer for game #1607 will be a challenge for most players. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 5.3 of 6 guesses. That makes it ever-so-slightly easier than the 5.5 guess average on November 11.

General Wordle Hints For November 12

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: The word contains a repeated vowel.
  • Hint 2: It’s often used in sports scoring terminology.
  • Hint 3: The term comes from French, and it signals that opponents are tied.
  • Hint 4: You’ll hear it most in tennis, when both sides reach 40–40.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1607 for November 12, 2025

Starter Words For November 12, 2025

If you want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • CURED
  • CLUED
  • DUNCE

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1607 On November 12, 2025

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: DEUCE

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1606 on November 11, 2025:

Answer: GIZMO

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles. Reminder, you can check out every past Wordle answer in our official archive.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1607?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on November 13 will be Wordle Game #1608.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

Need more help with other daily games? Let us know what games you’d like tips and clues for in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: Epic Games Refutes Fortnite Gambling Accusations, Evidence Says Otherwise
item.content:encoded:
Epic Games has denied that gambling mechanics are being added to Fortnite in user-created experiences, despite their own explanation confirming their addition.

Leaks first emerged to state that “gambling” was coming to UEFN, which was confirmed in the latest patch notes, but there appears to be some confusion about the clarification of “gambling” in the game.

Epic Games Denies ‘Gambling’ Added to Fortnite

Epic Games approached Insider Gaming to request a correction to our article about the addition of “gambling” in Fortnite, stating that gambling is against the Fortnite Developer Rules.

Section 1.11 of the Developer Rules states that developers cannot “implement gambling content, raffles, or casino-style games,” which are “prohibited whether or not they involve real money or virtual currency.”

Additionally, section 1.15.5 states that “teach or prominently feature images or activities that are typically associated with real-world gambling, casino-style games, or games of chance that offer a prize, even if they are not directly simulating a gambling experience, are not permitted in any form.”

Epic Games explained that, instead, the addition is for “paid random items” and that developers must “disclose the actual numerical odds of what the player may receive before the player makes a purchase.” However, Epic Games denies that gambling and paid random items are the same.

Despite Epic Games’ arguments, the above still constitutes gambling. Any paid-for item with a chance of a specific reward is still gambling, just as loot boxes in other titles qualify as gambling.

This is confirmed by legal action in countries like Belgium, where the Belgium Gaming Commission banned loot boxes in 2018 and declared the content to be “in violation of gambling legislation.”

This article will be updated if Epic Games provides any further details on the addition.

For more Fortnite, find out where to find bosses in The Simpsons mini-season, and learn how to get your Sidekick to emote in the game.

item.title: PlayStation 5 is ‘Only in the Middle of The Journey’, Says Sony
item.content:encoded:
Sony Chief Financial Officer Lin Tao has said that Sony believes the PlayStation 5 is only at the midpoint of its journey.

The quote came from Sony’s latest quarterly earnings call, where Sony CFO Line Tao revealed that the PlayStation 5 is currently only in the middle of its lifecycle. Tao said,

“Our view is that compared to conventional console lifecycles. Looking at the PS4 lifecycle, it seems to be getting longer and longer. Especially the PS4, which was launched in 2013, and it’s been over a decade since then, but there are many active users enjoying the console… So from that perspective, we believe that the PS5 is only in the middle of the journey, and we are really planning to expand it even further.”

So, When Will The PS6 Release?

Well, Tao’s comments are not actually suggesting that the PlayStation 6 is another five years away, instead, she’s suggesting that the console generation of the PlayStation 5 will bleed through during the PS5. Just like with the current generation with the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4, we’re now only just seeing developers move away from the PS4 with its games.

So, in theory at least, the PlayStation 6 is scheduled to release likely in 2027 – 2028, with the PlayStation 5 continuing to be supported to around 2031 – 2032.

The support for the ‘past generation’ is simply because of economics, allowing developers to release on a much bigger market than they would if they just developed games for the latest generation. For instance, on PlayStation 6’s launch, which could sell 10-15 million units in its first year, it’s not an ideal market to solely release a game on. Instead, it’s much better to release on the PlayStation 6 (10-15 million units), plus the PlayStation 5 (likely 100 million units+ by 2027).

It’s why popular games such as Call of Duty still remain on past-generation consoles, simply because the platform still has a large number of players.

What do you think of the PlayStation 5 being in the middle of its generation? When do you think the PS6 will be released? Let us know your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more from Insider Gaming, take a look at where to find bosses in The Simpsons mini-season, and check out suggestions the revive system will be altered in the next chapter.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: What is Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Worlds Collide? Endgame, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is bringing a host of new adventures into the fray, but the mysterious Worlds Collide mode has raised questions among the community.

First emerging as a query following the start of preloads for Black Ops 7 becoming available, a download option for Worlds Collide was confusing, as it wasn’t abundantly clear what the download was for—unlike the options for Zombies and multiplayer, which are self-explanatory.

Fear not, though, as the answer is out there, and we’ve got all the details you need for Worlds Collide in Black Ops 7.

What is Worlds Collide in Black Ops 7?

Worlds Collide is the name for the Campaign in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and specifically refers to the endgame mode available once the campaign is completed.

Black Ops 7 features co-op with up to four players throughout the campaign, with a huge focus on replayability in the post-game when the main story is completed.

As revealed by Activision, the endgame mode is a new and shared experience “where the narrative continues to unfold.” It takes place on the Avalon map, with POIs from across Black Ops history, featuring discoverable intel, expansive skill tracks, and more.

Detailed in the Call of Duty blog, the endgame mode takes place after the conclusion of the 11 co-op campaign missions that make up the game’s story, and tasks players with exploring Avalon to find The Guild’s remaining Command Centers, while battling with exposure zones that are leaking a mysterious toxin into the city.

The area is expected to be the best place to grind for the exclusive campaign camos that are available for weapons in Black Ops 7, for the first time, which adds to the camos available in multiplayer, Zombies, and Warzone.

Is Worlds Collide PvP or PvE?

Unlike Warzone, the Worlds Collide endgame mode is an entirely PvE operation, and there is no combat against other players.

The mode is designed for one-to-32 players in squads of up to four, where players can choose to tackle smaller objectives individually in their squad, or combine with other squads to take down more difficult objectives.

Different areas of Avalon have different recommended Combat Ratings, providing varying degrees of challenge for players, but there are no PvP offerings available.

What are your thoughts about the introduction of endgame content to the campaign in Black Ops 7? Let us know in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Black Ops 7 content, learn how you can play early using the New Zealand trick, and check out the full list of trophies and achievements.

item.title: MonsterVerze Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox MonsterVerze monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on free rewards, including Ghoulars, Crowns, Halos and much more. 

Your journey as a Ghost in MonsterVerze is packed with quests and flashy catwalks. This fashion-themed Roblox experience takes a unique approach to the classic dress-up genre by introducing a strong storyline, monster-themed cosmetics, and smoother gameplay mechanics. However, to become a fashion personification, you must uncover mysteries and “survive in style” as per the game’s official description, using our active MonsterVerze codes. These promo codes offer special accessories and cosmetics that will enhance your fashion appeal. Your treasury may also be filled using the free Ghoulars, in-game currency. 

Active MonsterVerze Codes

  • WEAREBACK – Nautical Nacre Halo and x5000 Ghoulars
    MVHOMECOMING – Homecoming Balloons, Opal Plushie, and x6000 Ghoulars
  • MV1MILLION – Shattered Love Crown 
  • BUGFIXES02 – x10,000 Ghoulars 

Inactive MonsterVerze Codes

There are no inactive codes for MonsterVerze. Active codes that go inactive will be added here. 

How to redeem MonsterVerze codes?

Steps to redeem the active codes for Monster Verze are here: 

  1. Launch MonsterVerze and spawn on the server. 
  2. Press “IGhost” on the right side of the screen. 
  3. Select “Settings” to spot the code box. 
  4. Enter any code into the “Enter Code…” text box. 
  5. Activate the code by hitting the “Redeem” button.

More about MonsterVerze Codes

The in-game “Shop” is the best place to spend your code-earned Ghoulars. Just press the “IGhost” and select the “Shop” app. Here you can find various in-game clothing that will up your style. The best Accessories, Tops, Full, Arms, Bottoms, and Footwear cost a lot of money. Below, we’ve shortlisted the finest garments along with their prices that should be in your inventory: 

Accessories: 

  • Star Boy Headphones – 5500 Ghoulars 
  • Frankstein Lolita Bunny Plushie – 15,000 Ghoulars
  • Frankstein Lolita Bow – 4000 Ghoulars

Tops:

  • Frankstein Lolita Top – 12,000 Ghoulars
  • Earie High Haunted Top – 5500 Ghoulars
  • Star Boy Jacket & Top – 10,000 Ghoulars

Full: 

  • Flowy Dress – 6000 Ghoulars
  • BabyDoll Dress – 6500 Ghoulars

Arms: 

  • Frankstein Lolita Sleeves – 10,000 Ghoulars
  • Eerie High Sophisticated Sleeves & Gloves – 6000 Ghoulars

Bottoms: 

  • Heartbreakers Skirt – 10,000 Ghoulars
  • Frankstein Lolita Skirt – 22,000 Ghoulars
  • Dreamboy Day Shorts – 10,000 Ghoulars

Footwear:

  • Frankstein Lolita Heels – 20,000 Ghoulars 
  • Alt Battie Rebellious Shoes – 10,000 Ghoulers 

To access the claimed cosmetics, open the IGhost and choose “Dress Up” to open your wardrobe. Now, select “Clothing” to view and equip all the code-exclusive freebies.

FAQs on Monsterverze Codes

What are the latest codes in Monsterverze? 

WEAREBACK is the latest active code in Monsterverze. 

When will the codes in Monsterverze expire?

The active codes do not have any official expiration timings. Hence, they will expire at any moment. 

How often are new codes issued for Monsterverze? 

A new set of codes is speculated to be released during new updates and special events.
